titles.title: Employee Benefits Protection Act of 2005

To amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to ensure that employees are not improperly disqualified from benefits under pension plans and welfare plans based on the misclassification or reclassification of their status.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 3/2/2005--Introduced. Employee Benefits Protection Act of 2005 - Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) to prohibit employers from disqualifying employees from benefits under their pension and welfare plans by misclassifying or reclassifying employee status.
